title: 86/245/EEC: Commission Decision of 2 May 1986 amending Decision 82/733/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Hungary approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 2 May 1986
amending Decision 82/733/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Hungary approved for the purpose of importing fresh meat into the Community
(86/245/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 82/733/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 May 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 362, 31. 12. 1985, p. 8.
(3) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 67.
(4) OJ No L 311, 8. 11. 1982, p. 10.
(5) OJ No L 287, 29. 10. 1985, p. 37.
(6) OJ No L 108, 26. 4. 1983, p. 18.
